member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.MemoryAllocationMode
member.summary: Defines memory allocation modes that can be used during PDF processing.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.MemoryAllocationMode.Normal
member.summary: Default memory allocation mode, all resouces are being loaded to RAM.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.MemoryAllocationMode.ResourcesLowMemory
member.summary: Only resources taking less than will be kept in memory, other resources will be cached to disk.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderMode
member.summary: Defines rendering modes that can be used for PDF page rendering.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderMode.HighSpeed
member.summary: The high speed mode, uses simplified composition for transparent objects. A recommended setting.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderMode.HighQuality
member.summary: Produces high quality ouputs, uses advanced composition for transparent objects.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings
member.summary: This class represents a mechanism to configure processing of the PDF.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

members.member:
Registers the font in library's font cache.
The font data. Only TrueType(.ttf) and TrueType collection (.ttc) fonts are accepted. If is null. If there was an error during font registration. It means that the doesn't contain a valid font data. s

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.UnregisterUserFonts
member.summary: Unregisters all user fonts from library's font cache.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.MemoryAllocationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the memory allocation mode.
member.value: The memory allocation mode to be used by document processor.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.ResourceSizeLimit
member.summary: Defines the resouce size limit in bytes that controls whether the resouce should be loaded to RAM or cached to disk. Valid only if the corressponding setting is set. See property.
member.remarks: Setting this property has effect only if is set to . Minimal value is: 1048576 bytes (1 megabyte) Default valus is: 5242880 bytes (5 megabytes)

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.GlobalSettings
member.summary: Gets the global settings.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.SystemFontPaths
member.summary: A read-only collection of system folders where the rendering engine tries to find font files by default, e.g. for windows it will be %WINDOWS_FOLDER%\fonts. If you wish to add custom font search path see property.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.UserFontPaths
member.summary: An editable collection of user-defined folders where the pdf kit engine tries to find font files in addition to system folders. If the application is opened in trusted mode the paths are expected to be file system based, otherwise they will be processed as isolated storage based paths. An will be thrown as a result of attemp to add null or empty value.
member.value: Empty by default.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.EngineSettings.UserFontMappings
member.summary: Gets a user font mappings dictionary, which can be used to map fonts used in document to a font with a particular name when font substitution happens. These mappings are being evaluated in the order of addition when the engine needs to resolve the font. Special font names are supported: "*" maps to all fonts.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.ErrorHandling.DocumentLoadException
member.summary: Indicates that problem has happened during the loading of the document. It might be thrown if document has invalid structure of if invalid password was specified.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.ErrorHandling.PageLoadException
member.summary: Indicates that problem has happened during the loading of the page. It might be thrown if document has invalid structure or requested page is out of bounds.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleBead
member.summary: This class represents an article bead.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleBead.NextBead
member.summary: Gets the next bead in the thread. In the last bead, this entry is null.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleBead.PrevBead
member.summary: Gets the previous bead in the thread. In the first bead, this entry is null.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleBead.Page
member.summary: Gets the location page.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleBead.Rect
member.summary: Gets the rectangle specifying the location of this bead on the page. The rectangle has the following format: [left top right bottom] in the page's coordinate space.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleThread
member.summary: This class represents an article thread.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleThread.Info
member.summary: Gets the article thread information containing information about the thread, such as its title, author, and creation date.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.ArticleThread.FirtsBead
member.summary: Gets the first bead in the thread.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType
member.summary: This enum represents a page's dispaly options.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.Unknown
member.summary: Location is not specified.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.XYZ
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the coordinates (left, top) positioned at the upper-left corner of the window and the contents of the page magnified by the factor zoom. A null value for any of the parameters left, top, or zoom specifies that the current value of that parameter shall be retained unchanged. A zoom value of 0 has the same meaning as a null value. Used params: Left, Top, Zoom

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.Fit
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the entire page within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the page within the window in the other dimension. Used params: none

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitH
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the vertical coordinate toppositioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of the page within the window. A null value for top specifies that the current value of that parameter shall be retained unchanged. Used params: Top

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitV
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of the page within the window. A null value for left specifies that the current value of that parameter shall be retained unchanged. Used params: Left

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitR
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the rectangle specified by the coordinates left, bottom, right, and top entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the rectangle within the window in the other dimension. Used params: Left, Bottom, Right, Top,

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitB
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit its bounding box entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the bounding box within the window in the other dimension. Used params: none

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitBH
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the vertical coordinate top positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of its bounding box within the window. A null value for top specifies that the current value of that parameter shall be retained unchanged. Used params: Top

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Navigation.DisplayType.FitBV
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of its bounding box within the window. A null value for left specifies that the current value of that parameter shall be retained unchanged. Used params: Left

member.summary: This class represents a navigation event args.

The new page.

member.summary: Gets the old page.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo
member.summary: This class represents a page info.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.Width
member.summary: The width of the rectangle created by intersecting and if it's present and applying component. It gives you the width of the page's visible area, as it would be displayed into Acrobat Reader.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.Height
member.summary: The height of the rectangle created by intersecting and if it's present and applying component. It gives you the height of the page's visible area, as it would be displayed into Acrobat Reader.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.Rotate
member.summary: The number of degrees by which the page shall be rotated clockwise when displayed or printed. The value shall be a multiple of 90. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.ArtBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that shall define the extent of the page’s meaningful content (including potential white space) as intended by the page’s creator.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.BleedBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that shall define the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped when output in a production environment.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.TrimBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that shall define the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.CropBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that shall define the visible region of default user space. When the page is displayed or printed, its contents shall be clipped (cropped) to this rectangle and then shall be imposed on the output medium in some implementation-defined manner.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.MediaBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that shall define the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page shall be displayed or printed.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.Links
member.summary: Gets the links.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.PageInfo.IsCanceled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is canceled.
member.value: true if this instance is canceled; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Represents a resolution setting container used in method and its overloads.

member.exception: If value for dpiX is not greater than zero.

member.summary: Gets or sets the X dpi, should be greater than zero.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.Resolution.DpiY
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y dpi, should be greater than zero.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether need to cancel progressive search.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether search should is being performing in forward direction.

member.summary: Searches for a specified text using index data built for a PDF file.
member.param: The progressive search handler.
The text to search for.
The index to search from.
if set to true the search will be performed from top to bottom otherwise if set to false - from bottom to top.

member.remarks: If license is not set, search will work for first three pages only.

member.name: T:Apitron.Licensing.ApitronLicenseAttribute
member.summary: An attribute used for licensing, every product has its own specialized implementation of this class. Its role is to allow a user to set a license string, alternative way is to use function.

member.summary: Gets the license string.

member.name: T:Apitron.Licensing.License
member.summary: Represents a license object, it can be used for obtaining license state or setting a license. License also can be set using specialized version of the .

member.summary: Sets the license.
member.param: The license string.
member.exception: If license string is null or empty.

member.summary: Gets the state of the license.

member.name: T:Apitron.Licensing.LicenseState
member.summary: Contains possible diagnostic codes that might be set when you apply a license.

member.name: F:Apitron.Licensing.LicenseState.InvalidLicense
member.summary: License you are trying to set is invalid, so it's not the license the component is expecting.

member.name: F:Apitron.Licensing.LicenseState.Accepted
member.summary: It means that license has been accepted by the component.

member.name: F:Apitron.Licensing.LicenseState.LicenseIsExpired
member.summary: Indicates that license is expired, so you have to renew your subscription in order to get this component active again. But you still can use it with latest version released prior to expiration.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RotationAngle
member.summary: Defines possible angles for page rotation.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RotationAngle.Rotate0
member.summary: Means no rotation, zero degrees.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RotationAngle.Rotate90
member.summary: Rotate by 90 degrees.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RotationAngle.Rotate180
member.summary: Rotate by 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RotationAngle.Rotate270
member.summary: Rotate by 270 degrees.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ScaleMode
member.summary: Defines possible page content scaling modes.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ScaleMode.Absolute
member.summary: Page content will be fit into given dimensions absolutely, it means that each side of the page will have it's own scaling factor.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ScaleMode.PreserveAspectRatio
member.summary: Page's aspect ratio will be preserved and content will be fit into given dimensions.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffCompressionMethod
member.summary: Defines possible compression methods that can be used for tiff saving.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffCompressionMethod.LZW
member.summary: Specifies the LZW(Lempel-Ziv-Welch) compression method.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffCompressionMethod.CCIT4
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT4 compression method.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffCompressionMethod.RLE
member.summary: Specifies the RLE compression method.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffCompressionMethod.None
member.summary: Compression is not used.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffRenderingSettings
member.summary: Extends basic rendering settings with things specific to TIFF saving.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderingSettings.BackgroundColor

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether document should be processed as it'd be printed. Mostly affects annotation objects that have the setting allowing them to be printed or not.
member.value: true if printer mode is on; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TiffRenderingSettings class. The default values for DPI are 144 ( CCIT4 compression method ).

member.summary: Defines possible compression methods that can be used for tiff saving.

Adjust the horizontal resolution of rendered images.
Adjust the vertical resolution of rendered images.

member.summary: Gets or sets the compression method.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffRenderingSettings.DpiY
member.summary: Gets or sets the dpi Y.

member.summary: Gets or sets the dpi X.
member.value: The dpi X.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TiffRenderingSettings.WhiteColorTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the white color brightness level for CCIT4 compression method, since CCIT4 produces bitonal images we need to convert all colors to black or white. This setting defines which colors will be considered white by comparing their brightness with the value specified. So all colors with brightness greater than defined value will be white and others black.
member.value: The CCIT4 white color brightness level, valid range is [0.0 to 1.0]. Where zero belongs to black and one belongs to white. Default value is 0.9.
member.exception: If value doesn't fall into valid range.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.DocumentInfo.ParsePdfDate(System.String)
member.summary: Parses PDF date string and returns datetime object. Date values used in a PDF shall conform to a standard date format, which closely follows that of the international standard ASN.1 (Abstract Syntax Notation One), defined in ISO/IEC 8824. A date shall be a text string of the form (D:YYYYMMDDHHmmSSOHH'mm) where: YYYY shall be the year MM shall be the month (01–12) DD shall be the day (01–31) HH shall be the hour (00–23) mm shall be the minute (00–59) SS shall be the second (00–59) O shall be the relationship of local time to Universal Time (UT), and shall be denoted by one of the characters PLUS SIGN (U+002B) (+), HYPHEN-MINUS (U+002D) (-), or LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z (U+005A) (Z) (see below) HH followed by APOSTROPHE (U+0027) (') shall be the absolute value of the offset from UT in hours (00–23) mm shall be the absolute value of the offset from UT in minutes (00–59). The prefix D: shall be present, the year field (YYYY) shall be present and all other fields may be present but only if all of their preceding fields are also present. The APOSTROPHE following the hour offset field (HH) shall only be present if the HH field is present. The minute offset field (mm) shall only be present if the APOSTROPHE following the hour offset field (HH) is present. The default values for MM and DD shall be both 01; all other numerical fields shall default to zero values. A PLUS SIGN as the value of the O field signifies that local time is later than UT, a HYPHEN-MINUS signifies that local time is earlier than UT, and the LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z signifies that local time is equal to UT. If no UT information is specified, the relationship of the specified time to UT shall be considered to be GMT. Regardless of whether the time zone is specified, the rest of the date shall be specified in local time.
member.param: The date string.
member.returns: Parsed date if conversion was successful, otherwise .

member.summary: Indicates the state of the font.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontState.Unresolved
member.summary: This value indicates that font is unresolved and should be mapped to another font.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontState.Resolved
member.summary: This value indicates that font has been succesfully resolved and its contains meaningful value.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontState.Embedded
member.summary: This value indicates that font is embedded inside the PDF file itself, so no mapping is needed.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType
member.summary: Represents possible types the font can belong to.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.Type0
member.summary: A composite font—a font composed of glyphs from a descendant CIDFont.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.Type1
member.summary: A font that defines glyph shapes using Type 1 font technology.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.MMType1
member.summary: A multiple master font—an extension of the Type 1 font that allows the generation of a wide variety of typeface styles from a single font.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.TrueType
member.summary: The TrueType font format was developed by Apple Computer, Inc., and has been adopted as a standard font format for the Microsoft Windows operating system. Specifications for the TrueType font file format are available in Apple’s TrueType Reference Manual and Microsoft’s TrueType 1.0 Font Files Technical Specification (see Bibliography).

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.Type3
member.summary: A font that defines glyphs with streams of PDF graphics operators.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.CIDFontType0
member.summary: A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on Type 1 font technology.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.CIDFontType2
member.summary: A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on TrueType font technology

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontType.Unknown
member.summary: Font type can't be determined, usually indicates an error.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Page
member.summary: Represents a page in PDF file.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.TransformRegion(Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Search.SearchResultRegion,System.Int32,System.Int32,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderingSettings)
member.summary: Transforms the region specified in original page space, to transformed page space using the given for rendering. This method can be used for mapping to rendered page.
member.param: The region to transform.
Width of the page to map this region into.
Height of the page to map this region into.

The settings used for rendering, you should use the same settings to get a correct mapping between original page and transformed page. If for example, you render the page double-sized and want to map a region from original page to this new image, you would need to pass the same settings in order to get correct results.
member.returns: Transformed region.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.TransformRegion(Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Search.SearchResultRegion,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.Resolution,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderingSettings)
member.summary: Transforms the region specified in original page space, to transformed page space using the given for rendering. This method can be used for mapping to rendered page.
member.param: The region to transform.

The resolution of the resulting image. By default the resolution of the PDF page is set to 72 dpi so if you render the page using its original size you get this resolution. This setting allows you to set desired resolution, it's an equivalent to setting a bigger resulting image size.

The settings used for rendering, you should use the same settings to get a correct mapping between original page and transformed page. If for example, you render the page double-sized and want to map a region from original page to this new image, you would need to pass the same settings in order to get correct results.
member.returns: Transformed region.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.RenderAsInts(Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.Resolution,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderingSettings,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.ErrorHandling.ErrorLogger)
member.summary: Renders the page to an image represented by array of integers with pixel format ARGB8888(hence one array element represents one pixel), the stride width would be desiredWidth in this case.
member.param: The resolution of the resulting image. By default the resolution of the PDF page is set to 72 dpi so if you render the page using its original size you get this resolution. This setting allows you to set desired resolution, it's an equivalent to setting a bigger resulting image size.
The rendering settings, can't be null.
An optional error logger object.
member.returns: A bitmap representing content of the page, any errors encountered will be logged to if present. If rendering fails null will be returned.
member.exception: If are null.
If is null.

member.name: M:Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.RenderAsInts(System.Int32,System.Int32,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderingSettings,Apitron.PDF.Rasterizer.ErrorHandling.ErrorLogger)
member.summary: Renders the page to an image represented by array of integers with pixel format ARGB8888(hence one array element represents one pixel), the stride width would be desiredWidth in this case.
member.param: Width of the resulting image, should be greater than zero.
Height of the resulting image, should be greater than zero.
The rendering settings, can't be null.
An optional error logger object.
member.returns: A bitmap representing content of the page, any errors encountered will be logged to if present. If rendering fails null will be returned.
member.exception: If or are zero or less.
If are null.

members.member:
Renders the specified page to an image represented by array of integers with pixel format ARGB8888(hence one array element represents one pixel), the stride width would be desiredWidth in this case.
Width of the resulting image, should be greater than zero. Height of the resulting image, should be greater than zero. The bitmap data. This data should have the size equal to desiredWidth * desiredHeight The rendering settings, can't be null. An optional error logger object.
A bitmap representing content of the page, any errors encountered will be logged to if present. If rendering fails null will be returned.
Width and Height can't be negative or zero. settings If or are zero or less. /// If is null.If is null.

member.summary: Renders the page to an image represented by array of integers with pixel format ARGB8888(hence one array element represents one pixel), the stride width would be desiredWidth in this case.
member.param: Width of the resulting image, should be greater than zero.
Height of the resulting image, should be greater than zero.
The crop box defines the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped (cropped) when rendered.
The rendering settings, can't be null.
An optional error logger object.

An optional error logger object.
member.returns: A bitmap representing content of the page, any errors encountered will be logged to if present. If rendering fails null will be returned.
